title: Welcome to the house of Bael
body:
**Bael is a free template that gives you an easy way to start a blog that uses modern technologies like static-site JAMstack architecture, CSS grid layout, responsive design, fuzzy search, and all wrapped up in a brutalist aesthetic.**

Bael runs using [Nuxt.js](https://nuxtjs.org), [Vue.js](https://vuejs.org), [Netlify CMS](https://netlifycms.org), and is hosted by [Netlify](https://netlify.com). It uses [Buzzfeed's Solid CSS style guide](https://solid.buzzfeed.com/) for atomic, immutable styling.
